revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Stark Mountain |image = [[File:Stark Mountain.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Stark Mountain. |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 227. }} '''Stark Mountain''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
